verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump ’s] decision to [V: withdraw] [ARG1: the United States] [ARG2: from the Iran agreement] may be the most dangerous and destabilizing move yet of his tumultuous presidency .
President Trump ’s decision to withdraw the United States from the Iran agreement [V: may] be the most dangerous and destabilizing move yet of his tumultuous presidency .
